pages.text: This strong swimmer can buff you with regen, haste and strength when it swims with you, but will attack when provoked. Feed it a gilded protosteak for it to drop an embryo core(used in an armor recipe)! Can be bucketed. They will attack drowned and can be found in most ocean biomes. They hunt squid and will drop their skulls and teeth occasionally when killed. See following page for gilded proto steak:
